## Load Data & Packages



```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(glmnet)
# library(readr)
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r load data}
gravity_df <- read_delim("citynet/src/output/gravity_df_noDUM.csv", 
                               ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)

head(gravity_df)
```

```{r}
ggplot(gravity_df) +
  geom_histogram(aes(gravity_df$collocation_en)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(gravity_df$collocation_fr))
```
